message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm interested in your product, but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $105?
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $108. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a great value!
